(viii) → (x) → (ii) → (iv) → (i) → (v) → (iii) → (vii) → (ix) → (vi)
Nelson Mandela was the great leader of South Africa. In fact, he was one of the greatest leaders of the world who struggled against apartheid throughout his life. The blacks were treated cruelly. questions.uddipok: Suppose, you are a student of 'X' College. Write an application to the Principal of your college for introducing multimedia facilities in classrooms.

sub_questions.explanation:
[Your Name]
[Your Address]
[City, State, Zip Code]
[Your Email Address]
[Your Phone Number]
[Date]
The Principal, [X College], [College Address]
Subject: Proposal for Introducing Multimedia Facilities in Classrooms
Respected Sir/Madam,
I hope this letter finds you in good health and high spirits. As a student of [Your Course/Department] at X College, I am writing to bring to your attention a proposal that I believe will significantly enhance the learning experience for all students: the introduction of multimedia facilities in classrooms.
In today's digital age, traditional teaching methods are being complemented, and in many cases replaced, by interactive and multimedia-based learning techniques. The integration of multimedia resources such as projectors, smart boards, and audiovisual equipment can greatly enrich the educational experience by making lessons more engaging, interactive, and accessible to diverse learning styles.
Multimedia facilities in classrooms would enable instructors to incorporate a variety of teaching aids such as educational videos, interactive presentations, and digital simulations into their lectures. This would not only capture the attention of students but also facilitate better understanding and retention of complex concepts.
Moreover, multimedia facilities can accommodate different learning preferences and cater to the needs of students with varying abilities, ensuring a more inclusive learning environment. Additionally, the use of multimedia technology fosters creativity and critical thinking skills among students by encouraging them to explore, analyze, and synthesize information in innovative ways.
I believe that the introduction of multimedia facilities in classrooms aligns with X College's commitment to providing quality education and preparing students for success in a rapidly evolving world. Therefore, I urge you to consider this proposal favorably and take the necessary steps to implement multimedia facilities in our college classrooms.
Thank you for considering my suggestion. I am confident that this initiative will greatly benefit the academic community at X College and contribute to the overall enhancement of our educational experience.
Yours sincerely,
[Your Name] [Your Course/Department] [Your Roll/ID Number]

questions.uddipok: Write a paragraph on 'Cyclone Mocha' within 200 words.

sub_questions.explanation:
Cyclone Mocha
Extremely severe cyclone 'Mocha' was a powerful and deadly (মারাত্মক) tropical cyclone originated in the North Indian Ocean which affected Myanmar and parts of Bangladesh in May 2023. The name Mocha is derived from the Yemeni port of Mokha. Cyclone Mocha slammed'the coastlines of Bangladesh and Myanmar, affecting millions of people. It is one of the strongest storms to hit the Bay of Bengal in more than a decade. It intensifies with sustained winds of 161 m p h 161 \mathrm{mph} 161 mph and guts as strong as 195 m p h 195 \mathrm{mph} 195 mph . In preparation for Cyclone Mocha, airports were closed, fishermen were ordered to suspend their work, and 1,500 shelters. were set up for people from vulnerable areas to take over in safer places. Bangladesh's government had evacuated (সরিয়ে দেওয়া) 7,50,000 people ahead of the storm, but Rohingya refugees were not allowed to leave their permanent structures. It is estimated that 1300 shelters and 16 mosques and learning centers were damaged by the gusty winds. Fallen trees and landslides have caused more damage. Meanwhile, the Maritime' ports of Chattogram, Cox's Bazar, and Payra were advised to hoist great danger signal 10. Besides, Mongla seaport was asked to show a local warning signal 4. Coastal districts of Cox's Bazar, Chattogram, Feni, Noakhali, Lakshmipur, Chandpur, Barishal, Bhola, Patuakhali, Jhalakathi, Pirojpur, Barguna and their nearby islands and chars were under great danger signal 8. Bangladesh largely escaped the worst impacts of very severe cyclone Mocha, as the storm barely touched the country's south-eastern tip while making landfall on the Bangladesh and Myanmar coast. The cyclone, however, made a mess of St. Martin's Island, about 9 k m 9 \mathrm{~km} 9 km south of the south-eastern tip of mainland Bangladesh, with a battering wind up to 147 k p h 147 \mathrm{kph} 147 kph , levelling about 1100 houses, and shapping 3,200 trees. As it was coming towards the mainland, it weakened and ended with heavy shower of rains.

questions.uddipok: Write a paragraph on 'Moral Degradation' showing its causes; effects and solution within 200 words.

sub_questions.explanation:
The Causes and Effects of Moral Degradation of Young Generation
Moral values are those set of standards by. which we distinguish between right and wrong. Degradation (অবক্ষষয়)' of moral 'values or moral degradation among the younger generation is an emerging issue. The erosion in moral values has taken a dangerous turn. The revolution in science and technology . has made our life easy and reachable. But, we should realize that our moral degradation is making our society ruthless (নিষ্ঠুর) than ever. We had a rich culture where people respected each other and there was harmony in the community in religious and social issues. But today when we keep eyes in'the dailies, we cannot but be ashamed and thundered as we have to see the news of pervading cruelty, notoriousness, rape, bribery, killing, trafficking, adulteration of food, medicine, leaking of question papers and what not. But what is causing our society to engage in such ominous (অশুভ/ভীতিজনক) deeds? We don't need to go far to seek the answer. It is nothing but lack of moral teaching and religious counselling in educational and social institutions. The greed for money and power, injustice and discrimination in society, excessive desire or mania to gain something illegally and disrespecting the law of the country are also the causes of present degradation of moral or social values among the youths. But, time is passing away fast to think over the issues. So, it is time that recovery must be started from the grass roots and the leaders, parents, teachers, and other social stakeholders must understand that the need of the moment is to acknowledge the most heinous moral degradation.
